hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo "giteePullRequestIid: ${giteePullRequestIid}" echo "giteeAfterCommitSha: ${giteeAfterCommitSha}" echo "giteeRef: ${giteeRef}" git config --global core.compression 0 export giteeTargetBranch=master
set +x function delete_labels() { echo "Delete labels" curl -X DELETE "https://gitee.com/api/v5/repos/opengauss/CM/pulls/$1/labels/$3" -H "Authorization: Bearer $2" -H 'Content-Type: application/json' > /dev/null }
function add_running_label() { delete_labels ${giteePullRequestIid} ${token} ci-pipeline-failed delete_labels ${giteePullRequestIid} ${token} ci-pipeline-success
curl -X POST "https://gitee.com/api/v5/repos/opengauss/CM/pulls/${giteePullRequestIid}/labels" \ -H "Authorization: Bearer ${token}" \ -H "Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8" \ -d '["ci-pipeline-running"]' > /dev/null } function add_failed_label(){ curl -X POST "https://gitee.com/api/v5/repos/opengauss/CM/pulls/${giteePullRequestIid}/labels" \ -H "Authorization: Bearer ${token}" \ -H "Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8" \ -d '["ci-pipeline-failed"]' > /dev/null }
function add_success_label(){ curl -X POST "https://gitee.com/api/v5/repos/opengauss/CM/pulls/${giteePullRequestIid}/labels" \ -H "Authorization: Bearer ${token}" \ -H "Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8" \ -d '["ci-pipeline-success"]' > /dev/null }
#add_running_label set +x
cm_repo=https://gitee.com/opengauss/CM.git #${giteeTargetBranch} server_branch=master
#plugin_repo=https://gitee.com/kidhasdream/Plugin.git #server_branch=main a=0 flag=0 while [ $a -lt 10 ] do echo $a rm -rf ${WORKSPACE}/CM timeout 60 git clone -b ${server_branch} "${cm_repo}" "${WORKSPACE}/CM" if [[ $? == 0 ]] ; then flag=1 break fi a=`expr $a + 1` done
if [[ $flag == 0 ]] ; then echo "clone code failed!" exit 1 fi
cd ${WORKSPACE}/CM #git rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree #git config remote.origin.url ${cm_repo} #git fetch --tags --force --progress origin ${giteeRef}:${giteeRef} #git checkout -b ${giteeRef} ${giteeRef}
echo "edit in background"
mkdir -p ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss/binarylibs cd ${WORKSPACE} rm -rf openGauss-third_party_binarylibs* rm -rf om set +x
if [ $server_branch = "2.0.0" ] || [ $server_branch = "2.0.1" ]; then echo "user 2.0.0 version 3rd binarylibs" wget -q -P ${WORKSPACE} ftp://mpp:openGauss1%232_3%24@192.168.0.155/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs-2.0.0.tar.gz -O ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs.tar.gz else echo "user latest 3rd binarylibs" wget -q -P ${WORKSPACE} ftp://mpp:openGauss1%232_3%24@192.168.0.155/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs.tar.gz -O ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs.tar.gz fi
#wget -q -P ${WORKSPACE} ftp://mpp:openGauss1%232_3%24@192.168.0.155/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs.tar.gz -O ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs.tar.gz set -x tar -zxf ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs.tar.gz
cd ${WORKSPACE}/CM export CMAKEHOME=/usr/local/cmake318 export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$CMAKEHOMEb:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH export PATH=$CMAKEHOME/bin:$PATH sh build.sh -3rd ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs/ --pkg
